mixed-citation.article-title: Review of the braconid parasitoid subfamily Doryctinae (Hymenoptera, Braconidae) from the United Arab Emirates and Yemen

tp:treatment-sec.p: Heterospilus rubrocinctus – Belokobylskij 1994: 23 . — Belokobylskij & Maetô 2009: 175 . — Tang et al. 2013: 2005 . — Yu et al. 2016 .
